name: Adventure Portal
description:
Welcome
Adventure Portal is a simple platform that allows players to connect and run their pen and paper role playing campaigns online! This is a ongoing project that will see additions and improvements as support grows.

Adventure Portal features player and gm profiles that hold all stats and campaign information, a game grid where players and GMs can place custom tokens -- each with their own information sheets, sizes, names, and labels, and a GM controlled sound and music board for storytelling enrichment, and also an integrated voice chat system.
